content: Collect user's desire by asking multiple choice questions about other topics they want to explore beside their obligation. Only return the data with following format '<start> desire:' + <desire> + close with <end>. Stop at <end>.

<start> desire:Which of these areas are you interested in exploring further? A) Quantum Computing B) Neural Networks C) Data Visualization D) Cybersecurity E) None. Please select the most relevant option for your research interests or professional development goals.<end>
